Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 160%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Per "Pure Saiyans" or "Peppy Gals" Category ally on the
team*
- ATK & DEF 16%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of performing a critical hit 6%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is a "Universe Survival Saga" or "Pure Saiyans"
Category enemy*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When 6 or more "Universe 6" Category allies are on the
team*
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When there is an ally whose name includes "Caulifla"
attacking in the same turn*
- ATK & DEF 160%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Guards all attacks

5310.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF, 
causes supreme damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers DEF
